title: Civil Infrastructure and Building Systems
description: Principles and practices for the sustainable design, fabrication, and installation of systems for the civil infrastructure and building; including structural, air/gas, water/wastewater, electrical, and control systems. Methods and materials used for fabrication and installation; including cost and schedule considerations. 4 lectures. Crosslisted as ARCE/CEÂ 475.
prerequisites: Senior standing in CE or ARCE
